titles.title: For the bread and for the wine

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: For the bread and for the wine, For the pledge that seals Him mine, For the words of love divine, We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Only bread and only wine, Yet to faith, the solemn sign Of the heav’nly and divine! We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For the words that turn our eye To the cross of Calvary, Bidding us in faith draw nigh, We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: For the words that tell of home, Pointing us beyond the tomb, “Do ye this until I come,” We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Till He come we take the bread, Type of Him on whom we feed, Him who liveth and was dead! We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Till He come we take the cup; As we at His table sup, Eye and heart are lifted up! We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: For that coming, here foreshown, For that day to man unknown, For the glory and the throne, We give Thee thanks, O Lord.
